<style>

div.transbox {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-right: 0;
}



.sn{
	font-weight: bold;
}
.form{
	font-size: 85%;
	float: right;
}
.runner{
	font-weight: bold;
}

div.racehdrline {
	margin:10px 0 6px 0;
	font-weight: bold;
}
div.racehdrline:not(:first-child) {
    margin-top:30px;
	border-top:1px solid #ccc;
}
div.runnerline {
    margin: 4px 0;
    background: #f5f5f5;
    border-bottom:1px solid #ccc;
	padding-top: 3px;
}
div.runnerline>div {
    padding:0 2px;
}

span.wearsft,
span.wears,
span.btnfav,
span.cdwin {
	background-color:#8C8A8A;
	border-radius:4px;
	color:white;
	padding:2px;
	margin-right:3px;
	font-size:10px;
}

span.wearsft {
	background-color:red;
}
span.btnfav {
	background-color:blue;
}
span.cdwin {
	background-color:#B552A5;
}

div.spline {
margin-top:10px;
}

div.spline div {
color: #060606;font-size: 108%;
}
div.spline div span {
font-weight:bold;
}


</style>

<script>
	function scrollFunction() {
		
		if ( document.documentElement.scrollTop > 87 
				|| document.body.scrollTop > 87 ) {
		
			if ( !$("#btnxsmenu").hasClass("btnxsmenuwithad") ) {
		
				$("#topBtn").show();
			
				$("div.xsmenucontainer a.navbar-brand").hide();
			
				$("div.xsmenucontainer>div>nav").addClass("navbar-fixed-top");
					if ( $("div.xsmenucontainer>div>nav>div.navbar-header>button#btnsearch").is(":visible") ) {
						$("div.xsmenucontainer>div>nav>div.navbar-header>button#btnsearch").addClass("scrollhide").hide();
				}

				if ( $("div.xsmenucontainer>div>nav>div.navbar-header>button#btnht").is(":visible") ) {
					$("div.xsmenucontainer>div>nav>div.navbar-header>button#btnht").addClass("scrollhide").hide();
				}
				if ( $("div.xsmenucontainer>div>nav>div.navbar-header>button#btnlogio").is(":visible") ) {
					$("div.xsmenucontainer>div>nav>div.navbar-header>button#btnlogio").addClass("scrollhide").hide();
				}
				if ( $("div.xsmenucontainer>div>nav>div.navbar-header>button#btnsignup").is(":visible") ) {
					$("div.xsmenucontainer>div>nav>div.navbar-header>button#btnsignup").addClass("scrollhide").hide();
				} 
				$("#btnxsmenu").addClass("btnxsmenuwithad");

				var dwidth=window.innerWidth;
				var lofset = 60;
				if ( dwidth > 440) {
					lofset = (dwidth-320) / 2 ;
				}
				$("#wrapperleadermobile").css( {'position':'fixed', 'top': '1px', 'left': lofset+'px', 'z-index':'83648' });
				$("body").css( {'padding-top':'50px'});
			
				var irsxNavbarH = $( window ).height()
				- $( "nav#xsmenu").outerHeight(true)
				- $( "nav#footmenu").outerHeight(true);
			
				$( "div#irsxNavbar").css("max-height", irsxNavbarH+"px");

			}
			
		} else {

			if ( $("#btnxsmenu").hasClass("btnxsmenuwithad") ) {

				$("div.xsmenucontainer>div>nav").removeClass("navbar-fixed-top");
				$("div.xsmenucontainer a.navbar-brand").find("img").attr("src","/images/logo.png");
				$("div.xsmenucontainer a.navbar-brand").css("width","45%");
				$("div.xsmenucontainer>div>nav>div.navbar-header>button.scrollhide").removeClass("scrollhide").show();

				$("#wrapperleadermobile").css( {'position':'relative', 'left':'0px', 'z-index':'0'  });
				$("body").css( {'padding-top':'0px'});

				$("#btnxsmenu").removeClass("btnxsmenuwithad");
				$("div.xsmenucontainer a.navbar-brand").show();

				$("#topBtn").hide();
		
				var irsxNavbarH = $( window ).height()
				- $( "div#toptandc").outerHeight(true)
				- $( "div.xsmenucontainer").outerHeight(true)
				- $( "nav#footmenu").outerHeight(true);

				$( "div#irsxNavbar").css("max-height", irsxNavbarH+"px");
		
			}
		}
	}

	function topFunction() {
		document.body.scrollTop = 0;
		document.documentElement.scrollTop = 0;
	}

	$(window).on("scroll", function(e) {
		if ($("div.xsmenucontainer").is(":visible")) {
			scrollFunction();
		}
	});
</script>

<script>
$(document).ready(function () {

	 const targetDate = new Date("March 10, 2026 13:20:00").getTime();

	 // Update the count down every 1 second
  	 const timer = setInterval(function() {

	    // Get today's date and time
	    const now = new Date().getTime();

	    // Find the distance between now and the target date
	    const distance = targetDate - now;

	    // Time calculations for days, hours, minutes and seconds
	    const days = Math.floor(distance / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
	    const hours = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
	    const minutes = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
	    const seconds = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);

	    // Output the results into the elements using jQuery
	    $('span.days').text(days);
	    $('span.hours').text(hours);
	    $('span.minutes').text(minutes);
	    $('span.seconds').text(seconds);

	    // If the count down is finished, display some text
	    if (distance < 0) {
	      clearInterval(timer);
	      $("div.timer-unit").remove();
	      $("div.fest-unit span.label").css( {'font-size':'2.3rem'});
	    }
	  }, 1000);
	
	
  	 $('#searchmodal').on('click','.panel-heading', function () {
  		 
    	var hddiv = "#"+$(this).attr("id").replace(/collapse/g, 'heading');
  		var hddivactive = "#"+$('#searchmodal').find("span.activeup").closest(".panel-heading").attr("id");

  		if ( hddiv != hddivactive ) {
  			$('#searchmodal').find("span.activeup")
     			.removeClass("glyphicon-menu-up activeup")
     			.addClass("glyphicon-menu-down");
  		}
  		
  	   if ( $(hddiv).find("span.glyphicon").hasClass("glyphicon-menu-up") ) {
  	  		 $(hddiv).find("span.glyphicon")
  	       		.removeClass("glyphicon-menu-up")
  	       		.addClass("glyphicon-menu-down");
  	   } else {
  	  	   $(hddiv).find("span.glyphicon")
   	      .removeClass("glyphicon-menu-down")
   	      .addClass("glyphicon-menu-up activeup");
  	   }
  	 });
	 
	 
	 
});
</script>

	  // remove bc mobile and tablet ad slots
//	  const elements = document.getElementsByClassName("betsense-mobile-container");
//	  while (elements.length > 0) elements[0].remove();
	  
	  const elements = Array.from(document.getElementsByClassName('betsense-mobile-container'));
	  elements.forEach(element => {
	    // Get the parent of the current element.
	    const parent = element.parentElement;
	    // Check if the parent exists and is a <div>.
	    // This is good practice to prevent errors if the element has no parent or a different parent element.
	    if (parent && parent.tagName === 'DIV') {
	      // Get the parent's parent (grandparent).
	      const grandparent = parent.parentElement;
	      if (grandparent) {
	        grandparent.removeChild(parent);
	      } else {
	        element.remove();
	      }
	    }
	  });
	  
	  
  } else {
	  // remove bc desktop ad slots
//	  const elements = document.getElementsByClassName("betsense-desktop-container");
//	  while (elements.length > 0) elements[0].remove();
 
	  const elements = Array.from(document.getElementsByClassName('betsense-desktop-container'));
	  elements.forEach(element => {
	    const parent = element.parentElement;
	    if (parent && parent.tagName === 'DIV') {
	      const grandparent = parent.parentElement;
	      if (grandparent) {
	        grandparent.removeChild(parent);
	      } else {
	        element.remove();
	      }
	    }
	  });
  
  }
  </script>
